verses.verse: <S%H349>How<s%> is the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H6004>become<s%> <S%H6004>dim!<s%> how is the <S%H2896>most<s%> fine <S%H3800>gold<s%> <S%H8132>changed!<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> are <S%H8210>poured<s%> out in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2351>street.<s%>

The <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H5537>comparable<s%> to fine <S%H6337>gold,<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> are they <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> as <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H5035>pitchers,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H3335>potter!<s%>

<S%H1571>Even<s%> the sea <S%H8577>monsters<s%> <S%H2502>draw<s%> out the <S%H7699>breast,<s%> they give <S%H3243>suck<s%> to their <S%H1482>young<s%> ones: the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> is become <S%H393>cruel,<s%> like the <S%H3283>ostriches<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H3243>sucking<s%> child <S%H1692>sticks<s%> to the <S%H2441>roof<s%> of his <S%H2441>mouth<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst:<s%> the young <S%H5768>children<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H6566>breaks<s%> it to them.

They that did <S%H398>feed<s%> <S%H4574>delicately<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets:<s%> they that were <S%H539>brought<s%> up in <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H2263>embrace<s%> <S%H830>dunghills.<s%>

For the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H1431>greater<s%> than the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of the sin of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> that was <S%H2015>overthrown<s%> as in a <S%H7281>moment,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H2342>stayed<s%> on her.

Her <S%H5139>Nazarites<s%> were <S%H2141>purer<s%> than <S%H7950>snow,<s%> they were <S%H6705>whiter<s%> than <S%H2461>milk,<s%> they were more <S%H119>ruddy<s%> in <S%H6106>body<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies,<s%> their <S%H1508>polishing<s%> was of <S%H5601>sapphire:<s%>

Their <S%H8389>visage<s%> is <S%H2821>blacker<s%> than a <S%H7815>coal;<s%> they are not <S%H5234>known<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets:<s%> their <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H6821>sticks<s%> to their <S%H6106>bones;<s%> it is <S%H3001>withered,<s%> it is <S%H1961>become<s%> like a <S%H6086>stick.<s%>

They that be <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> are <S%H2896>better<s%> than they that be <S%H2491>slain<s%> with <S%H7457>hunger:<s%> for <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H2100>pine<s%> away, <S%H1856>stricken<s%> through for want of the <S%H8570>fruits<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7362>pitiful<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> have <S%H1310>sodden<s%> their own <S%H3206>children:<s%> they were their <S%H1262>meat<s%> in the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> his <S%H2534>fury;<s%> he has <S%H8210>poured<s%> out his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> and has <S%H3341>kindled<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and it has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H3247>foundations<s%> thereof.

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world,<s%> would not have <S%H539>believed<s%> that the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> and the <S%H341>enemy<s%> should have <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

For the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of her <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of her <S%H3548>priests,<s%> that have <S%H8210>shed<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of her,

They have <S%H5128>wandered<s%> as <S%H5787>blind<s%> men in the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> they have <S%H1351>polluted<s%> themselves with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> so that men <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5060>touch<s%> their <S%H3830>garments.<s%>

They <S%H7121>cried<s%> to them, <S%H5493>Depart<s%> you; it is <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> <S%H5493>depart,<s%> <S%H5493>depart,<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> not: <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H5132>fled<s%> away and <S%H5128>wandered,<s%> they <S%H559>said<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> They shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> there.

The <S%H6440>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H2505>divided<s%> them; he will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5027>regard<s%> them: they <S%H5375>respected<s%> not the <S%H6440>persons<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> they <S%H2603>favored<s%> not the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>

As for us, our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> as <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3615>failed<s%> for our <S%H1892>vain<s%> <S%H5833>help:<s%> in our <S%H6822>watching<s%> we have <S%H6822>watched<s%> for a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that could not <S%H3467>save<s%> us.

They <S%H6679>hunt<s%> our <S%H6806>steps,<s%> that we <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> in our <S%H7339>streets:<s%> our <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H7126>near,<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled;<s%> for our <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come.<s%>

Our <S%H7291>persecutors<s%> are <S%H7031>swifter<s%> than the <S%H5404>eagles<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> they <S%H1814>pursued<s%> us on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> they laid <S%H693>wait<s%> for us in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

The <S%H7307>breath<s%> of our <S%H639>nostrils,<s%> the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%> in their <S%H7825>pits,<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> we <S%H559>said,<s%> Under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> we shall <S%H2421>live<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>

<S%H7797>Rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8056>glad,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz;<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through to you: you shall be <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> and shall make yourself <S%H6168>naked.<s%>

The <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H8552>accomplished,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> he will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H1540>carry<s%> you away into <S%H1540>captivity:<s%> he will <S%H6485>visit<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H123>Edom;<s%> he will <S%H1540>discover<s%> your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
